General information about clinical trials is available from the NCI website.       Placental-Site Gestational Trophoblastic Tumors and Epithelioid Trophoblastic Tumors    Treatment of stage I placental-site gestational trophoblastic tumors and epithelioid trophoblastic tumors may include the following:            -  Surgery to remove the uterus.
